body:
There are wayyy too many TDMs and OiTNs (IMO) in nebula right now and I believe that's not how nebula should be played (still MO) I know there are still quite a lot of DTMs (70:30 ratio) but in MCzone I believe it was more like 90:10.
I just think DTM has so much more gameplay possibilities and people can play it TDM style.

post your opinions and I'm sure I'm gonna get a lot of hate :D
body_tagged:

title: Too Many Nebula TDM Maps

replies.body:
Ahhhh
So. My opinion is good for me.
Many rushers have Shitty K/D. No one actually cares from K/D But clans are denying them for that :/
So, OiTN Is awesome game for make your K/D better. I guess some people requested that.
I love rushing, I don;t know what to say.
+1 Because i want more rushing
-1 because i want higher K/D
:P

replies.body:
If you want TDM I dont get why you cant play it on Nexus.... 
IMO what makes Nebula, Nebula is the DTM.
replies.body_tagged:
If you want TDM I dont get why you cant play it on Nexus....

replies.body: Nexus is Kit TDM but Nebula isn't. That's why they have TDM in normal nebula. Some of those maps are void to kits.
replies.body_tagged: Nexus is Kit TDM but Nebula isn't. That's why they have TDM in normal nebula. Some of those maps are void to kits.

replies.body: It gives players more of a challenge on the OiTN for dust devils. Just plain old nebula isn't always going to catch the attention of non-community members as much as a challenge of sorts. One hit kill on a DTM match? The players always have to be on their toes. Nebula without it would probably be the same old thing every time.
replies.body_tagged: It gives players more of a challenge on the OiTN for dust devils. Just plain old nebula isn't always going to catch the attention of non-community members as much as a challenge of sorts. One hit kill on a DTM match? The players always have to be on their toes. Nebula without it would probably be the same old thing every time.

replies.body: It should be OiTN (One In The Nexus.. Nexus is TDM - Nebula isn't ;/) But i do love OiTN <3
replies.body_tagged: It should be OiTN (One In The Nexus.. Nexus is TDM - Nebula isn't ;/) But i do love OiTN <3

replies.body: I'm not saying it should be removed because I'm sure almost everyone likes to play a TDM I just think there should be less of them. Also I used to luv venomous OiTN but then my internet got worse and my ping is too bad for it.

replies.body: Maybe there should be a sub section of neb as TDM and OiTN only because it's different to nexus, many people enjoy it and many people dislike it. There are enough maps for a large enough rot and can give people what they want instead of waiting for a good match.
